website_summaries.verdict: Fancy yourself as a virtual racing driver? This leather-clad, brushed metal extravaganza will transform you from Mark Webber into Stirling Moss.
pros: Leather and brushed metal feel (and smell) exquisite
Steering feedback bears striking resemblance to real life
Pedals don't budge under hard braking
Did we mention that the steering is just awesome?
cons: New York winters are less sloshy than the gearbox
Steering wheel motor more whiny than a day old puppy

customer_reviews.title: Just excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wheel: extremely satisfied. Played with with GTR 2 (and M3 Challenge), Live for Speed, rFactor, RACE 07, Dirt, Need for Speed. GTR 2 is best. LFS is great with F1 cars. Excellent value. The clutch is just excellent. Gripe: the wheel auto-calibrates; so sometimes it doesn't center itself perfectly. Just have to jiggle it a bit in the control panel screen and it usually fixes itself. Also, none of the games had the controls working out of the box. Had to manually define throttle, brake, etc... Pedals moves a bit on my carpet. Inevitable. Everything else is superb. I'd give 6 stars; not often do you get something so well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Jay L

customer_reviews.title: Inner child appeased.
customer_reviews.text: God, I love this wheel. It's everything I dreamed of as a kid and more. Bloody expensive but then it was absolutely worth it. Updated drivers are a must and you need to fiddle with profile editor to get the most out of it. Once I did that it performed flawlessly. Downside is of course you need a good bit of room and christ, the amount of cables this thing has! Would buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Weequay

customer_reviews.title: Great wheel
customer_reviews.text: If your a serious racer,this is your wheel.It works on the computer,PS3 and X box.What more do you want in a wheel? The controls are smooth,precise and solid. When I opened up the box it was obvious from looking at this it was serious hardware. 2017 and this is still going strong. Logitec no longer makes these so if you see one for 300 or less and you are a serious racing sim player, grab it. October 2017 and this wheel is still going strong. I wish I had bought another when I got this. They are selling for insane amounts of money right now.
customer_reviews.author: C. Goodnight

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't get better than this!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best steering wheels I have ever used. Better than anything in an Arcade in my opinion. The Shifter is great, the 6-speed works very well with Live For Speed, and the sequential/paddle shifters work great for Gran Turismo 4. The Forcefeedback is very strong in this wheel and allows you to feel which wheel is beginning to lose traction. This allows for precise control over the car which is important if you are trying to get that record lap time. The Pedal base is sturdy, and sticks to the ground like glue! And the Wheel itself feels great in your hands, like a real wheel.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wheel!
customer_reviews.text: The wheel is more expensive compared to the others. But its definitely well worth it. I brought it for GT5 Prologue and it works like a charm. I haven't gotten used to using the clutches yet. But everything else is very solidly built. Turns are very accurate with the 900 degree support. Cons are it doesn't have a PS button for the PS3 and there were no labelling what so ever what the buttons supposed to be. Other than that, its still an excellent wheel and I would definitely recommed anyone enjoy racing games.
customer_reviews.author: C. Joseph Li

customer_reviews.title: If it ain't broke, don't fix it!
customer_reviews.text: I used this forever for LFS and iracing. Never let me down! It helps if you have a racing seat to attach it to! Obviously the G27 is out and soon the G29 right!? So this is a bit outdated but still would do the job for you!
customer_reviews.author: Vesh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome G25 Racing Wheel
customer_reviews.text: I am a 63-year-old who has owned a couple of sports cars, but have never been into computer gaming. I purchased the G25 expressly for use on iRacing.com and have been very very pleased with the results. Very solidly build unit. The tactile feedback from the wheel is particually impressive, especially when tuned to feel like the real car. The shifter is a bit wimpy, but merely a matter of getting used to the feel. Have not tried the paddle shifters.
customer_reviews.author: Norm Winterowd

customer_reviews.title: Best Wheel Available
customer_reviews.text: First, it was painful to spend $200 on a racing wheel. I have the Playseats Evo, and so much wanted to enjoy the Xbox 360 wheel since I have almost every Xbox racing game already. However, after using the G25 on the PC, and the Xbox wheel on the Xbox 360.....I'll be doing all my racing on the PC. There is no comparison....the G25 is like driving a real car, the Xbox wheel is like a toy. In the end, I consider the G25 to be worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until it broke
customer_reviews.text: I used this for gran turismo on the PS3 for about a year. After about a year of minimal use it stopped centering. I found out that a small tone wheel was cracked and the manufacturer wouldn't replace it. I found a person from asia selling a custom brass replacement that worked great. For the amount I paid for this wheel I'm very disappointed in the failure and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Dumptruck

customer_reviews.title: G25 Wheel
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, realistic feel responds much like the real thing. Only issue so far is we use it on the PS3 and only three games so far work with it. I am sure that will change. So far none of the games support the gear shifts, you use the flippers on the side of the wheel. This is easier on the F1 game because it is so fast you hardly have time to get to the gear shift. I highly recommend this product for those who like racing on the PS3 for the price.
customer_reviews.author: James G. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Wheel
customer_reviews.text: After getting used to having a clutch(car dosen't stop pushing in a clutch) The wheel is great with good throttle and steeering control. The only fault that I have with it is I would have liked more of the buttons be on the wheel rather than the shifter. Running dirt and paved short tracks doesn't leave any time to look or fumble for a button. Being 64 doesn't help either. lol
customer_reviews.author: Pap Pettit

customer_reviews.title: G25
customer_reviews.text: I have been sim racing with this wheel since 2006. With other wheel and pedal sets I always wore out the pedals not the wheel itself. Once I bought this one that was over. These pedals are durable and the wheel has a "real" feel to it with the adjustable FF feature. Also the shifter adds a bit of realism to the experience when driving stock cars.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great wheel for serious simmers
customer_reviews.text: this is the wheel for you if you are serious about sim racing.high quality wheel and pedals. stainless steel parts. the shifter could be a little better. it lacks a realistic feel , but you get used to it. in netkar pro, rfactor 2, iracing, etc,..it feels very good. you simply feel alot with this wheel.
customer_reviews.author: rs missale

customer_reviews.title: best  wheel on the market! here's why...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wheel because it has a six-speed shifter plus reverse! it also has gas,brake,and clutch pedal.full 900 degree wheel rotation. real leather rapped wheel. metal gas,brake, clutch pedal and metal paddle shifters! force feedback is strong and very realistic. the only con is that the stick feels a little light and needs more resistance. Overall this is without a doubt the best wheel I ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Stormrider777

customer_reviews.title: logitech g25 FF wheel
customer_reviews.text: if you have the cash.. .get it! its everything they say it is. bottom line is i've heard it said by race drivers that a car talks to the driver, with the g25 i could hear :) sensational feel from the wheel... the pedals are fantastic! the shifter is good, but the options of sequential, H-pattern or paddles is more than enough to offset it somewhat negative light construction. all in all a satisfied customer here ~
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Boembeke

customer_reviews.title: best wheel out there!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: this is by for the best wheel I have found. I have a ps3 and had to buy play seats evolution and wow in front of my Mitsubishi 73 in 1080p its a race simulator. it was shipped fast and received fast. also you will enjoy the NEW LEATHER SMELL. yep thats right new car smell included. so don't hesitate you wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lalmond

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for driving games
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for driving games. It pisses me off they didn't put the required chip to allow this steering wheel to work on the PS4. They want you to spend another $400 on a Sony compatible steering wheel (you know how companies collaborate and sign partnerships) and then $60 bucks for the game. My God!
customer_reviews.author: Jammar

customer_reviews.title: Solid G25
customer_reviews.text: Bought mine years ago from Amazon. By now I've put 50,000 miles on it and it still works GREAT! If it ever breaks, I'll definitely buy another Logitech wheel + pedal + shifter setup, G27 or future release.
customer_reviews.author: BDM

customer_reviews.title: Next best thing to actually racing
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Logitech G25 because if connects to ps2/3 consoles as well as a PC. As for the wheels performance, what can I say it is thee best game wheel available! Games integration right now are not as vast as I would like but I think it's growing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Best available product of this type
customer_reviews.text: Excellent features, smooth operation, extremely accurate. Nice pedal set with adequate pressure unlike less expensive products. Nice to be ps2 / pc compatible. Gated shifter is cool but light touch isn't very realistic. For the money it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Technut Biker

customer_reviews.title: it just feels like plastic and isn't realistic
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't a fan of the gear shifter, it just feels like plastic and isn't realistic. I returned it and bought the Gran Turismo wheel for my PC/PS3 instead.
customer_reviews.author: Rand

customer_reviews.title: Not just another wheel
customer_reviews.text: I love driving games, and the more realistic...the better. This wheel adds a degree of realism that goes beyond just stompint the gas. You feel the road, you shift the gears (and not just paddles). Excellent product and the best wheel since ActLabs RS w/shifter.
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy261

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Wheel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this racing wheel because I wanted to make a racing sim so i could play grid, gtr 2, gtr evo etc... I am VERY happy that i bought this wheel instead of the others. the dual force feedback makes it feel like u are hitting every little bump. driving over cobblestone in grid is amazing and how fast the dff responds to the users hands. 900 degree turning radius, 6 speed shifter as well as paddle shifters. Also has a brake, throttle and clutch which all work perfectly!!! AMAZING RACE WHEEL!!!!!!!!!! G25 FTW!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Carousos

customer_reviews.title: Simply the BEST.!
customer_reviews.text: Own it for more than 5 years...using almost every day...still works fine...what a great product. Very precise...and strong feed back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Logitech G25 raching wheel
customer_reviews.text: I use this mostly for playing GT5 and love this wheel. It is a must have for racing sim enthusiasts. Fanatec is another racing wheel that I would also consider buying. If this wheel was wireless, it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sugiyama

customer_reviews.title: Without a doubt the G25 is the best racing wheel
customer_reviews.text: The steering is accurate to a tee, the force feedback is unparalleled and the feel of the pedals is realistic, all this combined greatly improves the experience you will get from any race game.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: amazing product...
customer_reviews.text: couldn't ask for anything better. got this for my friend for xmas and he loves it. it's got a great design. we tested this wheel on NFS: prostreet on the PS3 and it works soooo much better than a controller. i definitely recommend this wheel over any others if you can afford it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew McMasters

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: This thing works like a charm. It installed easily on my vista based PC. The force feedback really does the trick. Would reccomend it to anyone who wants a top notch steering wheel and petals.
customer_reviews.author: J A

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product to use for racing games! its quite an experience! my boyfriend loved it and it made racing games more fun than using a mouse and keyboard
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: still smiling
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality and detail. My first steering wheel, that's why the smile...:) Took a while to figure out where all the wires plugged in, but when I finally plugged usb connector in the device was immediatly identified and has worked flawlessly since. The only complaint is that I wish I could adjust the angle of the pedals. In all very impressed with the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle C. Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still better than G29. The best wheel I ever had. Never got broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars!
customer_reviews.text: There's enough five star reviews on this thing that one more isn't going to matter. They're all correct, it's awesome. A bit pricey but nice!!! If you're using it with a PS3, the buttons on the shifter double as a controller (sans the Start, Select and PS button).
customer_reviews.author: B. D. McGrew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Racing Wheel!!
customer_reviews.text: This wheel feels great and feels realistic. Metal steering and pedals and with the leather makes this the best wheel. You like racing games this wheel is a must have!!
customer_reviews.author: Blong Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: A pretty good deal for those with an interest in sim racing. Had a difficult time in Vista, but it's working with the supplied software. Hopefully, updated software will iron out any wrinkles here. The larger diameter of the wheel, improved force feedback and pedals (with clutch), make for a more realistic and immersive experience. Well recommended.
customer_reviews.author: S. K.

customer_reviews.title: The G25 "I should have got this years ago"
customer_reviews.text: Been sim racing for about 6 years now using an old ps2 Logitech wheel. THAT was a TOY! THIS is different! From the moment I opened the box I knew this product was for serious racers. The sheer weight of the pedals and wheel told me that. There really isn't anything the company left out as far as quality goes. Once you start this bad boy up you won't want to shut it off!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The G25...what a steal from Logitech. Pricey, but if you love sim-racing games this IS the THE wheel for the price Cons: Mine was shipped poorly, a minor scratch on the shifter.
customer_reviews.author: mkepioneer

customer_reviews.title: Real Driving
customer_reviews.text: If you want to feel real driving than you should buy this product. We are playing GT5 with this.My all family members love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bulent Coskun

customer_reviews.title: Definite must-have for racing enthusiasts
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Great wheel for PC and Playstation games. Is well built and looks it will last for years. The clutch pedal is a definite USP over the other wheels on the market.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rao

customer_reviews.title: Great wheel good price
customer_reviews.text: Best invistment I've made and one of the best wheels you can buy very good if your really into online racing this wheel is perfect
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: The best available
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wheel/shifter/pedals I could find, and it has exceeded my expectations. I'm VERY happy with it. There is room for improvement with the pedals (too close together, my feet are always hitting each other), but otherwise it has been perfect for me. I have been using it to play GTR-2.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathon M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for driving simulator games
customer_reviews.text: Best wheel for driving simulator games.. the only thing i don't like is the shifter... It feels "cheap".. Another fast shipping from amazon..
customer_reviews.author: Yellow Power

customer_reviews.title: Fun stuff
customer_reviews.text: Haven't played this for a while but it's fun when I do. Much better control and the foot controls are well made. No problems with it so far and the forcefeedback is accurate enough for my tastes.
customer_reviews.author: Goat Herder

customer_reviews.title: simply excellent
customer_reviews.text: best steering wheel sim setup I've seen to date. (or at least under 1000 dollars) and the 6spd with a REAL slippable clutch makes it all worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S. Kolbeck

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this set up. the shifter is a bit flimsy feeling but there are ways to change it if you search on line.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: The best wheel ever
customer_reviews.text: If you take car racing seriously, then you must get this racing wheel, is the closes feeling to real racing.
customer_reviews.author: Panagrias

customer_reviews.title: logitech G25
customer_reviews.text: I would rate this prodoct overall a good product. It has how ever had a few problems. The table clams mechamism does not seem to hold properly on all surfaces and tend to slip off the edge. which can be a problem if you are in the mid of a tricky corner or trying to avoid a another vehicle. The tightening knobs are also difficult to turn and tighten. Hex bolt might be a better idea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall good wheel
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. I don't use the shifting console but wheel and peddles are very smooth and linear. The only thing I don't like is that it centers slightly off center. There may be a way to adjust this but I haven't tried to look yet
customer_reviews.author: A. Pope

customer_reviews.title: Review Edited...  Not really  Vista Compatible - Shifter problems...
customer_reviews.text: I must knock it down to 3 starts now... The shifter does not center correctly in sequential mode. Been through two of them. Many, many others reporting the same issues. Throw forward to engage is much longer than throw rearward, and sometimes it never disengages rearward engagement, causing you to miss shifts and run off the track. The software is NOT fully Vista compatible. The profiler is pretty well busted at this point. I'm not sure how they can use the "Vista Compatible" label, and not have software available. Same goes for the G15 Keyboard. Says it's "Vista Compatible", but the software does not work. Neither has Vista downloads available as of this writing.
customer_reviews.author: Just Lil' Ol' Me

customer_reviews.title: Okay Wheel
customer_reviews.text: The wheel is not as precise on the PS3 on wheel alignment and shifting with the manual pedals is not a realistic as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Shipped
customer_reviews.text: I just got my email saying it shipped and am tracking it to receive it tomorrow, so look for similar ones.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Berry

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy for PS3!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this for PS3 especially if you are looking for a wheel easily compatible with Gran Turismo. It is not one of the indicated wheels and comes with PC installation instructions. The controls are not corresponding to those in the options menu. Sure, pedals aren't metal, you don't get a clutch pedal and the steering wheel isn't leather wrapped but the GT steering wheel is a better value for most gamers.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Dude

product_meta.title: Logitech G25 Racing Wheel
product_meta.description:
Put on your head gear and slide your fingers over premium materials and hand-crafted components. Stand before a team of racing fanatics dedicated to providing the most realistic driving experience possible. With the G25 Racing Wheel, Logitech is taking sim racing controls to the next level, and we'd like you to come along for the ride. The G25's unique dual-motor force feedback transmission delivers powerful, high-fidelity force effects to the hand-stitched leather wheel, so you can feel under-and oversteer before you're on the barrier. Place your car in gear with the leather shift knob and adjust the speed you want with the sequential shift mode. Slam on the brakes without worrying about steering off course. With stainless steel gas, brake and clutch pedals, you’ll always stay on track. So, sit down, turn off the lights, and crank up the sound. You're not playing games anymore! With the G25, you're racing.

AMAZON.COM
Amazon.com Product Description Real metal. Real leather. Real racing. Premium materials. Hand-crafted components. A team of racing fanatics dedicated to providing the most realistic driving experience possible. With the G25 Racing Wheel, Logitech is taking sim racing controls to the next level, and we'd like you to come along for the ride. The G25's unique dual-motor force feedback transmission delivers powerful, high-fidelity force effects to the hand-stitched leather wheel, so you can feel under-and oversteer before you're on the barrier. 

Sit down, turn off the lights, and crank up the sound. You're not playing games anymore; with the G25, you're racing.

Features: 

Six-speed shifter with push-down reverse gear
Choose exactly the right gear for the turn. Plus a leather-wrapped shift knob so you can drive in style! Sequential shift mode
Provides backward compatibility. Logitech's exclusive carpet grip system
Holds fast to the carpet to provide a realistic driving experience. Dual-motor force feedback
The mechanism is smooth, quiet, and powerful. Stainless steel gas, brake, and clutch pedals
Eliminates flex from the pedals, so you can brake and accelerate with more precision. The clutch pedal makes heel-and-toe downshifting possible, keeping your gear changes quick and your RPMs high. 11" leather-wrapped steering wheel rim
With the 900-degree wheel rotation and hand-stitched leather, the wheel provides a realistic driving experience. System Requirements: 

 * PC with Pentium processor or compatible 
 * 256 MB RAM 
 * 20 MB of available hard disk space 
 * CD-ROM drive 
 * USB port 
 * Windows XP or Windows Vista 

or

 * PlayStation 2 or PlayStation 3 computer entertainment system 
 * Games that support Logitech Force Feedback 

Package Contents: 

 * Logitech G25 Racing Wheel (steering wheel) 
 * Shifter module 
 * Gas, brake, and clutch pedals 
 * Power supply 
 * Software CD-ROM 
 * User documentation 
 * 1-year limited warranty
feature_bullets: Exclusive carpet grip system provides a realistic experience when the G25 is placed on the floor
Sequential shift mode provides backward compatibility
Dual-motor force feedback transmission delivers powerful, high-fidelity force effects
Handcrafted components, including real leather on the steering wheel, provide an authentic feel
Change speeds with the six-speed shifter with push-down reverse gear
Handcrafted components, including real leather on the steering wheel, provide an authentic feel
Dual-motor force feedback transmission delivers powerful, high-fidelity force effects
Change speeds with the six-speed shifter with push-down reverse gear
Sequential shift mode provides backward compatibility
Exclusive carpet grip system provides a realistic experience when the G25 is placed on the floor
